channel.title: Hakin9 on Cr0w's Place
channel.description: Recent content in Hakin9 on Cr0w's Place

item.title: Hakin9 - SBC: Penetration Testing with Raspberry Pi
item.description: Instructor in the 4 week course for Hakin9 Media, in the topic of penetration testing with Raspberry Pi and other security related hardware. See project

item.title: Hakin9 - Attack and Defense in Blockchain Technologies
item.description: Instructor in the 4 week course for Hakin9 Media, in Blockchain security topics. See Project

item.title: Hakin9 - Attack and Defense in Blockchain Technologies [Book]
item.description: Alongside the 4 week course for Hakin9 Media, in Blockchain security topics, an eBook was created with all the content of the course. See Project or buy the Book.

item.title: Hakin9 - Bypassing Web Application Firewalls
item.description: Workshop Instructor in the 4 week topic, “Bypassing Web Application Firewalls”, hosted by the Hakin9 Magazine. See project

item.title: Hakin9 - Bypassing Web Application Firewalls [Book]
item.description: Alongside my 4 week topic, “Bypassing Web Application Firewalls”, hosted by the Hakin9 Magazine, an eBook was created with all the content of the course. See Project or buy the Book.

item.title: Hakin9 - Web Application Hacking: Advanced SQL Injection and Data Store Attacks
item.description: Workshop Instructor in the 4 week topic, “Web Application Hacking: Advanced SQL Injection and Data Store Attacks”, hosted by the eForensics Magazine. See Project

item.title: Hakin9 - Web Application Hacking: Advanced SQL Injection and Data Store Attacks [Book]
item.description: Alongside my 4 week topic, “Web Application Hacking: Advanced SQL Injection and Data Store Attacks”, hosted by the eForensics Magazine, an eBook was created with all the content of the course. See Project or buy the Book.

item.title: Hakin9 - Penetration Testing with Kali 2.0
item.description: Co-Workshop instructor in the topic “Penetration Testing with Kali 2.0” due to the release of the second version of the Kali OS, hosted by the PenTest Magazine. See project

item.title: Hakin9 - Android Malware Analysis
item.description: Workshop Instructor in the 4 week topic, “Android Malware Analysis”, hosted by the eForensics Magazine. See Project

item.title: Hakin9 - Penetration Testing with Android Devices
item.description: Workshop Instructor in the 10 week topic, “Penetration Testing with Android Devices”, hosted by the Pentest Magazine. You can find more here.
